context.title: Changes to feature set of Simal

section.title: What is Simal?
section.p: Simal is a framework for building systems for use by organisations that need to inform the communities around a group of related projects. The project is very young at this time, as such we welcome input into the requirements and design of the initial prototype system.
This release focuses integrating data from third parties with Simal and on providing data in machine readable formats for third parties.

action.p: Added getBackup() method to ISimalRepository. This method retrieves an N3 representation of the complete repository.

section.title: What is Simal Core?
section.p: Simal is the core repository and command line interface of the Simal framework which is used to build project registries. That is a place to register filter and search details about projects. The project is very young at this time, as such we welcome input into the requirements and design of the initial prototype system.

action.p: Added CLI command importOhloh to import data from Ohloh.net. In order to use this feature you must set the value of ohloh.api.key in local.simal.properties. See the Ohloh site for instructions on obtaining an Ohloh API key. Usage:
